SEARCH

Class Server

java.lang.Object
Server
public class Server extends Object
Class handling the new client socket connection. The server will create the ClientSocket associated with the client connection socket, and handle the communication between all of them.
See Also:
  • Thread
  • Socket

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server()
      Constructor of the Server class. It will create a new ServerSocket on port 10810 and store it in the attribute server

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      This method is run by the thread when it executes. This method is not intended to be invoked directly. This method will loop indefinitely to catch incoming client socket connection, store it in the clients. Then it will create a new ClientSocket to handle the IO communication between the client and itself.
      See Also:
      • Thread.run()

    • broadcast

      public void broadcast(String originPseudo, String msg)
      Method that will send the incoming message from a ClientSocket to all others
      Parameters:
      originPseudo - ClientSocket which sent the message
      msg - The message to send

    • broadcast

      msg - The message to send

    • exit

      public void exit(ClientSocket clientSocket)
      Method handling the termination request of a ClientSocket
      Parameters:
      clientSocket - ClientSocket which sent the termination request
